name: @fp/map
description: Functor and collection mapper function (object, array or any functor)
author: Adrien Gibrat <adrien.gibrat@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:full && npm run build:min && npm run build:full:min
scripts.size: npm run size:main --silent && npm run size:full --silent && npm run size:min --silent && npm run size:full:min --silent
scripts.size:full: echo "$npm_package_name with dependencies size `cat $npm_package_full_main | npm run size:format`"
scripts.size:min: echo "$npm_package_name minified & gzipped `gzip -9 -c $npm_package_min_main | npm run size:format`"
scripts.size:full:min: echo "$npm_package_name with dependencies minified & gzipped `gzip -9 -c $npm_package_full_min_main | npm run size:format`"
